name: iPhone 15 Pro
description: The latest flagship iPhone with A17 Pro chip, titanium design, advanced camera system with 3x zoom, and USB-C connectivity. Features a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display with ProMotion technology.

name: iPhone 15
description: The new iPhone 15 with A16 Bionic chip, improved cameras, and USB-C. Features a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display and advanced dual-camera system.

name: MacBook Pro 14-inch
description: Apple MacBook Pro with M3 Pro chip, 14-inch Liquid Retina XDR display, 18GB unified memory, and 512GB SSD storage. Perfect for professional workflows.

name: MacBook Air 15-inch
description: The new MacBook Air with M3 chip, 15.3-inch display, exceptional battery life up to 18 hours, and incredibly thin design at just 11.5mm.

name: Dell XPS 13 Plus
description: Premium ultrabook with Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, and stunning 13.4-inch InfinityEdge display. Perfect for productivity and creativity.

name: ASUS ROG Zephyrus G14
description: Powerful gaming laptop with AMD Ryzen 9 processor, NVIDIA RTX 4060 graphics, 16GB RAM, and 1TB SSD. Features a 14-inch QHD display with 165Hz refresh rate.

name: AirPods Pro (2nd generation)
description: Apple's premium wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation, spatial audio, adaptive transparency, and up to 6 hours of listening time.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5
description: Industry-leading noise canceling headphones with exceptional sound quality, 30-hour battery life, and crystal-clear hands-free calling.

name: SteelSeries Arctis 7P
description: Premium wireless gaming headset with lossless 2.4GHz audio, ClearCast microphone, and 24-hour battery life. Perfect for PC and PlayStation gaming.

name: Samsung Galaxy S24
description: Flagship Android smartphone with Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor, advanced AI features, 50MP camera system, and 6.2-inch Dynamic AMOLED display.

name: Google Pixel 8
description: Google's latest smartphone with Tensor G3 chip, advanced computational photography, 7 years of OS updates, and pure Android experience.

specifications.features: Magic Eraser, Real Tone, Live Translate

name: Microsoft Surface Laptop 5
description: Elegant laptop with Intel Core i7 processor, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, and beautiful 13.5-inch PixelSense touchscreen display. Runs Windows 11.

name: Logitech MX Master 3S
description: Advanced wireless mouse with ultra-precise scrolling, customizable buttons, multi-device connectivity, and ergonomic design for productivity.

name: Apple Watch Series 9
description: The most advanced Apple Watch with S9 SiP chip, double tap gesture, precision finding for iPhone, and comprehensive health monitoring.

specifications.features: Double Tap, Precision Finding, ECG, Blood Oxygen

name: Kindle Paperwhite
description: Amazon's premium e-reader with 6.8-inch glare-free display, adjustable warm light, waterproof design, and weeks of battery life.

name: iPad Air (5th generation)
description: Powerful and versatile tablet with M1 chip, 10.9-inch Liquid Retina display, advanced cameras, and all-day battery life.

name: Herman Miller X Logitech G Embody
description: Premium gaming chair designed for health, comfort, and peak performance. Features advanced ergonomic support and cooling technology.

name: LG 27UP850-W 4K Monitor
description: 27-inch 4K UHD monitor with USB-C connectivity, HDR10 support, and factory-calibrated colors. Perfect for creative professionals.

name: Logitech Brio 4K Pro
description: Professional 4K webcam with HDR, auto-focus, and advanced noise reduction. Perfect for video conferencing and content creation.

name: JBL Charge 5
description: Portable Bluetooth speaker with powerful sound, IP67 waterproof rating, and 20-hour battery life. Perfect for outdoor adventures.

name: Keychron K2 Mechanical Keyboard
description: Compact 75% wireless mechanical keyboard with hot-swappable switches, RGB backlighting, and Mac/Windows compatibility.

name: ASUS AX6000 WiFi 6 Router
description: High-performance WiFi 6 router with 6000 Mbps speeds, 8 antennas, and advanced security features for homes and small offices.

name: Samsung T7 Portable SSD 1TB
description: Ultra-fast portable SSD with USB 3.2 Gen 2 interface, password protection, and shock-resistant design. Perfect for professionals on the go.

name: Anker PowerCore 26800 PD
description: High-capacity portable charger with 26800mAh battery, Power Delivery fast charging, and multiple USB ports for all your devices.

name: Fitbit Charge 5
description: Advanced fitness tracker with built-in GPS, stress management, sleep tracking, and 7-day battery life. Includes 6-month Fitbit Premium.

specifications.features: Built-in GPS, ECG, EDA stress sensor

name: Philips Hue Color Bulb (4-pack)
description: Smart LED bulbs with 16 million colors, voice control compatibility, and app-based scheduling. Transform any room with dynamic lighting.

name: Breville Bambino Plus Espresso Machine
description: Compact espresso machine with automatic milk texturing, pre-infusion, and 3-second heat-up time. Perfect for home baristas.

name: DJI Mini 3
description: Ultra-lightweight drone with 4K HDR video, intelligent flight modes, and extended battery life. Perfect for travel and content creation.

name: Meta Quest 3 128GB
description: Next-generation VR headset with mixed reality capabilities, improved graphics, and intuitive hand tracking. Includes 6 months of Meta Quest+.

name: HP OfficeJet Pro 9015e
description: All-in-one wireless printer with automatic document feeder, borderless printing, and HP+ smart printing features. Perfect for home offices.

specifications.features: Auto duplex, ADF, HP Smart app
